title: How much can you earn using Chegg? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s not fixed my friend. Previously, I was working as a Managed Network Expert, so, I used to select the topic on which I want to work, then they used to provide hard copy containing questions via courier to my home address. At that time the payment for per question solved by me varied from Rs 60 to Rs 190. After that they stopped giving questions to me on offline mode basis and put me in an online Expert Answerer Community. Pros in EA Community: I can able to work at any time according to my wish, though the peak hour to work is from 02:00AM to 07:00AM IST.I can take as many questions as I can.Hassle free work without someone questioning you that why you have solved very less questions within a particular time period. So, you may or may not work for a month or two.No investment if you have laptop and internet connection (~512 kbps). The only thing needed is how smartly you solve a particular kind of problem without plagiarism.It is simply learn and earn kind of thing.In the month of mid October to December end, they give a good bonus (approx. 30% more than the actual price if the number of problems solved exceeds 60) for every question solved by you.Cons in EA community: Sometimes queue is dry so I have to keep refreshing and filling captcha for the question to appear on the screen.If you want to solve easy and less time consuming questions, then you may need to work during peak hours that I already mentioned above.So, finally I would love to give you answer of how much a person can earn rather then telling my earnings :P Now, the pay varies with the type of subject and topic you choose. It may be from Rs 50 to Rs 200 including taxes. Also, I have seen that they hired good expert answerer. You can refer to the link: NIT surges ahead in package race Moreover, I have heard people earning more that a lakh a month just by working on EA community. Chegg keeps on providing us information about the star performer of the month in Chegg MN India Newsletter. If you wish to work then you can refer to the link below: Expert Registration Process - Chegg India

I’m working as part-time subject expert Computer Science for last two years. Chegg is the best platform in which you get paid for sharing you knowledge. As you asked for earning from chegg, I would say it completely depends on number of questions you are answering per month and the subject you are choosing. Maximun rate per question is paid for Computer science which is 187 and lowest is for basic maths subject which is around 75. On an average I work around 20–25 days and spend around 2 hrs on working day on Chegg. I’ll try to do around 2–3 question. So for a month from 50–60 questions will be covered. If I take 55 as my monthly answers, I am able to make around 10000 rs (after 10% TDS deduction ) by working part time on Chegg. Now just imagine how I have earned so far. NB: Chegg is pretty good in paying salary on time. All the best…..

Chegg India recruits freelance subject experts to contribute answers on our Q&A Board. Chegg Q&A Board is a 24/7 online help where students post academic questions across 26 subjects. Earning potential of Chegg experts depend on the following; a.	Number of questions answered during a payment cycle. More the number of answers given, higher the earning. b.	Base payout rate is subject specific and from time to time bonuses are also launched. We process expert payments once every month. Payments are processed through NEFT Bank transfer by 15th of Every month for all answers conforming to answering guidelines. For Example- For all the Valid responses submitted by an expert between 1st-30th April 2019, payments will be processed by 15th May 2019. Our top experts easily earn around 20K to 50K on monthly basis.

I think chegg is a only genuine site which can pay you by sharing your knowledge. there are some tips to enhance your earning potential in chegg qna. From Sept to january Qna Board is flooded by question and bonus are available in this season upto 50% . So you can earn easily more than 1 lack by completing the task for respective bonus. February to August question flow average or very low in some.month so you can apply for TBs to ask your respective coordinator to provide you. Best login time 1am to 7am onwards

Chegg is platform where you can help many student on online platform by helping to solve their doubt and problems and you will get paid according to number of question you solved and earning keeps varying because flow of question is not same through out year But still you can manage to earn around 5o K if you can devote regular time on this platform and believe me it have much more potential than this so everything depends on the time you are devoting on this platform i know some of my friend who are working on it as full time and they are earning around 70 K in peak season chegg pay you on the basis of number of question you had solved in previous month and this amount will be credited to your account till 15 th of every month and one more thing i want to add here that they will pay you timely so they are very reliable when it comes to payment.

Hey I solve 6-7 questions per day. So monthly 200 around questions. And in advance math Chegg offers 150 Rs ( after tds deduction) per question. So my monthly earning from chegg is 30,000 Rs approximately.

All tutors are paid $20/hour for time spent in a lesson wif students, or time spent writing a student's written lesson explanation. The $20/hour rate is applied to the exact number of minutes accumulated during a given week. As a courtesy to tutors, we require a minimum lesson length of 5 minutes (i.e. if you connect wif a student and assist them in 2 minutes, you'll still be paid for 5 minutes). PayPal payments are processed automatically every Thursday morning, PDT/PST. Your weekly payments will include all lessons finished between Wednesday 7:05am PDT of last week and Wednesday 7:05am PDT of teh current week, meaning any lessons completed after Thursday 7:05am PDT will be included in teh following week's payment. All tutors are paid via PayPal.

I am SME at Chegg for last 2 years, and work for Statistics and Probability. I had a huge Education & Personal loan to pay, so initially I used to work full time like 8–10 hours a day. Now for last 6–8 months I have been focusing on my study and working very less like 2–3 hours, and in this 2–3 hours my target is to solve just 5 questions. For my subject Chegg pay rs 135 (after deduction of TDS). I think it is the best platform for those who want to study further and ladies who have subject knowledge and can spent few hours.

Every answer to a particular question in a subject has a fixed rate. The subject in which i am working as an expert answerer pays me rs 130–160 per answer. This however varies after the evaluation process of our answers. It all depends upon how much time one can spend giving proper answers. There are people who work part time and also full time workers. It is a great platform to share our knowledge and earn a good amount. All i can say is that chegg is a very reliable company and every answer that we give is valued and its worth our time and energy!

It depends on many factors. Subjects. Every subject has different per answer rate. General maths - 55, Economics - 137, Accounts - 147, Finance - 105, Operation management - 167.Your knowledge - their is no limit on the question you can solve. it depends on your knowledge of the subject.

Earning is totally dependent on number of questions you solve. If you have good subject knowledge and u can spend some 3–4 hrs during early morning then easily u can make 35k a month and the more u give ur time u can increase the earning. There are people who are making more than lakhs a month.

I know a Chrome Extension that was earlier free of cost but now its not. My friends use it and it does an unbelievable stuff on Chegg Auto Locking of the OpportunitiesNotifying u on every new opportunity. Irrespective of the place u r working in your lapi (no need of monitoring)U might not believe but try once. U will surely thank me. Click below to go to the addon page Chegg Tonic

I have started chegg during 2014–15 and still an active expert. I am doing electrical engineering and math. Solved around 25000 questions so far..My yearly earnings are around 5 lakh rupees. I’m mostly active in sep to dec.
Earning potential ? * Chegg pays for every question you answer correctly. * Experts easily earn from Rs. 30,000 - 1,50,000 per month. There is no upper limit on earning!

It is actually a subject expert Portal where you can earn by solving questions given by students. You will be paid per question which is correct. Approximately you can earn upto 10–12 k when volume is very high. Also things also depends on your Subject.
Similar question: How much do IIT students earn from Chegg?
The typical Chegg Subject Matter Expert salary is ₹20,000. Subject Matter Expert salaries at Chegg can range from ₹3,000 - ₹30,000.
